QuestData.Title: Beyond the Graves
QuestData.Description: Darnell tells me that the two of you have already met. That's good, because I'm sending you both into Deathknell. Your work is done here.$b$bSpeak with Deathguard Saltain in Deathknell, to the north. He will tell you more of what you must know.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Deathguard Saltain at Deathknell in Tirisfal Glades.
QuestData.RewardText: Those val'kyr have been really busy resurrecting you newbies lately. I've already seen a couple dozen new bodies run down that hill since this morning.$b$bYou, however, are the most promising $c I've seen today.
